title: Improve overall performance
body:
Every time I open the Dev tools the browser slows a lot and crash often especially with heavy sites. This do not happen with Chrome.
Resizing the view also is incredibly slow and stuck my workstation.

comments.body: If I could I'd give all my votes for this. The F12 tools performance and its effect on the browser itself is terrible. The worst bits are that the browser crashes constantly (when testing a JS heavy app) and that the browser behaves differently when the F12 tools are enabled. I need to test my app with the F12 tools closed because opening it makes me chasing bugfoots around.
